targets.expr: avg(asf_bots{job="$job", instance="$instance", state!="configured", state!="farming"}) by (job, instance, state)
avg(asf_bot_farming_time_remaining_minutes{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0"}) by (job, instance, bot, steamid)
avg(asf_bot_wallet_balance{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0", currency!~"CNY|KWD|VND"} / 100) by (job, instance, bot, steamid, currency)
avg(asf_bot_wallet_balance{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0", currency=~"CNY|VND"} / 10) by (job, instance, bot, steamid, currency)
avg(asf_bot_wallet_balance{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0", currency=~"KWD"} / 1000) by (job, instance, bot, steamid, currency)
avg(asf_bot_bgr_keys_remaining{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0"}) by (job, instance, bot, steamid)
avg(asf_bot_heartbeat_failures{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0"}) by (job, instance, bot, steamid)
avg(asf_bot_friends{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0"}) by (job, instance, bot, steamid)
avg(asf_bot_clans{job="$job", instance="$instance", bot=~"$bots", steamid=~"$steamids", steamid!="0"}) by (job, instance, bot, steamid)

topk(10, sum (label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", http_route!="", http_route!="$excluded_endpoint"}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")) by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route))

topk(10, sum (label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", http_route!="", error_type!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")) by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route))
avg(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (job, instance, http_request_method, url_scheme, server_address, http_response_status_code)

panels.title: Requests duration by server, method and status code
